title: Think about what happens to a packet step by step
text: A packet experiences several types of delay as it travels: first, it’s processed by the router; then it may wait in a queue; next, it’s transmitted bit by bit into the link; and finally, the bits propagate through the physical medium to the next node. Match each delay description to where it fits in this sequence.
